rows.label: qev065304_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! Oh man, today's training felt great.
I'm ready to take on anything. Look out, indigens!
You're gonna feel the PAAAAAIN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hey, got a job for me? Anything you need help with,
you just say it. My muscles'll take care of it in no time.
Here, check these babies out. Hnnnnnngh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Giotto how he would describe himself.

rows.label: qev065304_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Giotto that Lyvia wants to meet him.

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, the BLADEs are full of strong people,
but I could still take most of 'em in arm wrestling,
pumping iron, and other such manly arts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0004
rows.name:
And if some indigen wants to mess with our city,
I'll be there to crack ugly alien skulls![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yep, Giotto and his muscles can handle most anything.
...Er, except ladies. Always had bad luck with ladies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0006
rows.name:
Wait, what? There's a girl who wants to meet me?
...AND my muscles?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0007
rows.name:
I mean, yeah! Course I'll meet her! Dunno what we'll
actually TALK about, but I'll sure as hell meet her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0008
rows.name: Guess I'll figure that out later, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0009
rows.name:
She's probably a total weirdo if she's asking for me,
but you can't get totally ripped without breaking some
eggs and then eating 'em raw, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0010
rows.name:
A girl this cute, and she's interested in ME?!
This better not be some kinda scam...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065304_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm usually terrible around girls, but it's so easy talking
to Lyvia. She's...I dunno. Different. It's nice.[ST:wait ]
